ComicInfo.Summary:
It's hard to keep a good man down, and even harder to keep a truly evil one in the grave. Kaizen Gamorra returns and he is displeased with how events have transpired in his absence! Time to put his House back in order starting with exterminating the Mechajin Rebellion. But if the choices are "serve or die," the CyberNation is willing to sacrifice all for the chance at freedom.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/cybernary-20-6-divided-we-stand/4000-163976/
